thread.section_title: InnoMax Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InnoMax | innomax.com
thread.title: ROBERT & CRISTY CORBRIDGE
thread.title_full: InnoMax reviewed by ROBERT & CRISTY CORBRIDGE

author: ROBERT & CRISTY CORBRIDGE
title: ROBERT & CRISTY CORBRIDGE
text:
From the time we entered the store to the point where everything was completed, the group that I worked with was excellent. Time was scheduled and truck showed up on time. We had a little issue with one of the mattresses not feeling the same. Within a few days, a replacement was delivered and all issues resolved.
Very happy with my purchase and this group.
